website_summaries.verdict: A bright, dense beam makes this little penlight a handy tool to carry with you at all times.
pros: The beam is bright enough to reveal defects in bright sunlight
Focused light that doesn't fade at the edges
Designed for optimal use 6 feet away from objects
cons: May stop working properly after being dropped

customer_reviews.title: I bought this item because I didn't feel like splurging on the Rupes or the ScanGrip penlights ($50+
customer_reviews.text: As a professional car detailer this has become one of my most indispensable tools. I bought this item because I didn't feel like splurging on the Rupes or the ScanGrip penlights ($50+!!), and then I found this model... which runs on AAA's, which makes it loads more convenient. First few weeks of use and this little flashlight is great. At first I didn't think it would be bright enough to find paint defects in direct sunlight, but I have had no problems. I've also dropped it quite a few times and so far it's held up without a scratch! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I work in an auto shop and this worked very well for doing my inspections and shedding light on hard to see spots . . When it was actually working Had a lot of trouble getting it to stay on steadily shortly after I got it. I'd press the button and get light for a second before it would fade away. Tapping the light on something would usually bring it back, but as we all know that kind of fix only works for so long. Now thoroughly dead its rolling around somewhere in my toolbox having been replaced by another cheaper, and seemingly better pen light.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Grab one. One of the best flashlights made.
customer_reviews.text: Really one of the best flashlights you can get. Coast makes the best and the warranty is excellent. An inspection light throws a perfect, fully illuminated circle of light. Yes, for inspecting things. If you don't like regular flashlights where the light is brighter in the center and dim at the sides, then this is a great one. It's not really ultra bright because it's designed for looking at things up to maybe 6 feet away but works just fine around the house or in your car.
customer_reviews.author: MrCourtney

customer_reviews.title: Best penlight
customer_reviews.text: Ive bought pocket lights from snap on, mac, and matco for years at 50 bucks a pop because I use them everyday all day and really need it to do my job. Never again, this one is alot brighter and more durable. Only down side is that its slightly fater and doesn't fit in the pen slot in a tech shirt pocket but I guess my pocket screw driver or can get a pen and put it there lol. After using for about 6 months every day contacts for batteries have worn out like the others and light no longer works. They usually last a year. (Duracell batteries have never leaked)
customer_reviews.author: Quintin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent LED pocket light and just the right size.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent LED flashlight at a great price, just the right size (slightly larger than a pen). They seem to have improved the durability of the clip too. This is the second one I have owned over the past couple of years. The first clip snapped after daily use. I emailed the company and they were more than happy to provide a free clip at no charge. Thank you for great customer service and an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: studiotime

customer_reviews.title: Junk doesn’t work anymore
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one in October 2019, 6 months later (April 30th) doesn’t turn on After a casual use (I have it in my car for emergencies) and doesn’t work anymore ,I did replace the batteries and doesn’t work Will look for another brand I don’t even think has any warranty Wish I could give it any use but just sitting in my car and new batteries is dead
customer_reviews.author: 3RUJ0

customer_reviews.title: Multiple defective lights
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty disappointed in this pen light. The first one I ever bought was perfect but unfortunately I lost that one. I ordered another one and that one showed up with a cracked lens. Returned it and ordered another one. That one show up and there was a gigantic dead bug in the bulb and there is no way of taking it apart. Returned it. Ordered another one and sadly the bulb/lens is cracked again. Photo attached to show the light beam. Im over it.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Inspection Light & EDC
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this G20 to be carried in the pouch shown as an EDC. I was surprised at the size of this (and it came with batteries installed). For the price, and what you can see for the brightness (with old batteries installed) I am very content. Note: I am standing two feet away from the calendar (pic shown). I may update the review for night use. I usually inspect my vehicle early in the morning around the tires (due to vandalism, etc) so this light is perfect and not bulky like other flashlights I own.
customer_reviews.author: American Panda

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for about 4 weeks now and it's good thats it is small and lightweight but some times it dose not want to turn on when button is pressed i have to shake it hit it or press the button a couple of times I've put new batteries in because i thought the old ones where drained but the flashlight still dose the same thing I dont know if there all like this but based on my experience with my flash light i would not recommend buying it
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Recently I was without a cell phone for a week and a half. I realized the one thing I was missing was a light. This little unit checks all the boxes, and I'll never leave home without it again. It's ideal for up close situations, very bright crisp beam. Super comfy in the pocket. The button feels nice. Still on the first set of batteries too. Highly recommend, I already ordered one for my gf
customer_reviews.author: Peter Kroff

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little inspection light
customer_reviews.text: Not all that bright but perfect for inspection work and seeing things close up, the low level of brightness combined with an extremely even light field makes this perfect for seeing things without glare. On/off switch works perfect every time, battery life is, well don't know have never replaced it yet even after having for more than a year. Keep it in my shirt pocket for work all the time. Far better than the too bright LED flashlights with hot spot in the middle (Streamlight 66118 Stylus Pro Black, got this too, switch is junk and so is light ). This is the third one I bought after giving the first two away to others.
customer_reviews.author: Sloane Schrodinger

customer_reviews.title: Less expensive narrow focused beam in a heavy casing with a hard to press tail button.
customer_reviews.text: As an inspection beam It seems to work well. Clear circle with even brightness. The power button is more difficult to press than it should be. It's long and heavy making the balance while pressing the back awkward leading to a higher probability of dropping the light while operating with one hand. Yes it's durable but what if you drop it in a boiler, engine, between a wall or other space where retrieval is difficult or its fall could cause damage. So, for an everyday spot light, the focused beam is not good. For a specific inspection beam, it's a good value but not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Appropriately Priced at $5.98
customer_reviews.text: Like: Price at $5.98. Light has adequate illumination and the "trade off" is that because it is not exceptionally bright, it has better than average battery life. Wonderful warranty service. Dislike: There is a reliability issue because although the switches typically last for years, they sometimes, without any hint, begin working intermittently after a month. That said, if you don't mind paying the shipping, and sometimes a small fee, you can return Coast lights, and in about a month, they will mail you a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Shining Lite of Clearity
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit this is the second or third one of these flashlights that I've purchased. with my eyes getting older, I find that I have a bit of difficulty working in dark areas. This flashlight it great for that, and is big enough to hold on to. Most of the flashlights have gotten so small, it's difficult to hold an manipulate them while in use. Also, the beam is a nice crisp focused stream of light. Very much like a flood light on a stage. Coast has several other models that appear to be as good like the G19 and HP3. Another feature I like about the G20 is it's powered by two over the counter AAA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Colegate V. Spinks

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made product
customer_reviews.text: This penlight gives a bright, tightly focused beam with a sharply defined border. It seems solidly made and should last a long time. Up close the lit area is only an inch or so across and very bright, but at a few feet away it grows to a pretty wide illuminated area, less bright but still well focused with a defined border. If you need a floodlight, this isn't for you, but for up close work it's great. I rated the battery life and durability five stars, but that's a guess based on the quality of construction - I haven't had it long enough to really know.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Meyer

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Penlight
customer_reviews.text: I had several small LED flashlights. This one is my favorite! It is bright enough, the battery lasts, and the metal construction is sturdy. I like how it shines like a mini spotlight with a perfect shaped circle/ellipse. I bought one and liked it so much that I bought five more. One for my work bag, one for my car, one for my truck, one for my outing bag, and one for my wife's car. These are not long distance flashlights--these are for finding things in dark places and is most handy for that.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: The beam is fantastic and perfect for my use.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased during a sale and have not been disappointed. Have used it many times since purchase and it works perfectly for my purposes. Great for looking inside the engine bay or breaker box wiring. Have even used it to check pupil response on an animal after a seizure. I'm aware of the poor reviews related to the switch and I will be watching for that At this point, I would have no problem purchasing another one.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Smith

customer_reviews.title: No excuse to be caught without a good flashlight now
customer_reviews.text: I have one 4 years give or take and its been through alot .....granted the power on/off button appears to be made of the same material as the the flash light ,not the rubber like now which you have to watch not to cut or poke I guess but I dont go anywhere without one..amazing what you find in the dark crevices of those Big Box Stores. .I'd like to get more for gifts but its been pot luck if they're coming in the Nice Boxes or Plastic peg Hook Display
customer_reviews.author: JimR

customer_reviews.title: Beat pocket flashlight available
customer_reviews.text: The moat durable pocket light i have ever used. I am a auto dealer technician and use a pocket flashlight all day and even the big name lights never last more than a year before being awnt in for warranty repair. I purchased one of these to use while all 4 of my streamlights were in for warrany repair. I never opened the package when they came back and have used this light for 2 years with no problems. Bought another for my camping gear this spring
customer_reviews.author: Marriedwithchildren

customer_reviews.title: I love the inspection beam, but the 2 AA version light output is weak.
customer_reviews.text: I have both the single and two AA light version. This review is for the double AA version, which is great, but is no brighter than the single AA version. I love the light and clean inspection beam, but was really hoping to have some improved light output for the two battery version.
customer_reviews.author: Montana5

customer_reviews.title: Great optics
customer_reviews.text: The beam is bright, uniform, and has a sharp edge, that is, no light is wasted on dim periphery but completely concentrated in the focus area. This is very deliberately an "inspection beam" but it doesn't just work well at close distances, where the beam is very bright. The beam is not completely parallel but expands to illuminate a larger area at longer distances. Obviously, it is not as intense but this is an ideal use of the available light. This is a brilliant optical design.
customer_reviews.author: David Mccracken

customer_reviews.title: Great for medical pros
customer_reviews.text: I'm an ICU nurse and have gone through countless penlights. They always start shorting out a couple of weeks after you get them. Not the Coast. I first saw some neuro residents using it and they loved it. I was surprised at how inexpensive it was. I have been using it for a month now and it comes on right away every time, no shaking or smacking needed. Its bright and extremely durable/well built.
customer_reviews.author: AHawes

customer_reviews.title: Replacing A Mini Mag-Lite
customer_reviews.text: I carried a Mini Mag-Lite for a long time, but after many drops, the bezel is cracked and the lens is broken. Not to mention, it is pretty dim, even with a xenon bulb. This Coast light is an excellent alternative. I like the push button tail cap switch. With the pocket clip, it won't roll off smooth surfaces. Battery life is great, after about 2 months, they're still going strong. It even fits in the Mag-Lite belt sheath for easy carry. Not bad for a 10 dollar inspection light.
customer_reviews.author: WireNut

customer_reviews.title: Great beam pattern, slightly heavier and more durable than expected
customer_reviews.text: The beam pattern is very consistent and should make car paint inspection and small PC repair much easier, given that both my garage and office are very dark. That being said, this thing is pretty heavy. I imagine it's going to be very durable given how thick the case on it it must be, but it was a bit surprising. If you're looking for a shirt-pocket-able inspection light, this probably isn't it. That being said, it's vastly stronger than expected or necessary. For shoots and giggles, I tried bending it in half. I couldn't.
customer_reviews.author: CiDirkona

customer_reviews.title: Great budget flashlight
customer_reviews.text: It seems very durable and well designed. I enjoy the sharp circle spotlight produced by the lens. It's a fantastic buy for the price. It's ideal for close up inspection work, if it is too bright, eyes may hurt. I would say it has a great balance of battery life, brightness, price and functionality. I would totally buy this one again over Maglite AAA ones. I bought a AA Coast flashlight 3 years ago and it's still working with adjustable focus.
customer_reviews.author: Tools. Electro. DIY

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but powerful
customer_reviews.text: This tiny flashlight picks a powerful punch. It lights up an Area with a bright light. You will be able to see your way around the room. It does not light up the entire room but wherever you were pointing you will be able to see very well. How about this go In my daughter in my car for emergencies but used it when our power was out in the home. It is small enough to store away easily and bright enough to make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra Green

customer_reviews.title: A Winner!
customer_reviews.text: I can't recommend this enough. 1) This light pours out a beam that is solid with no black spot or brightness changes in the beam 2) The battery life is great 3) It is reliably built 4) The form factor is great etc etc etc Just get one of these and then compare it to everything else. This is the best pen light you will get if you don't want flood style lighting.
customer_reviews.author: D3N1Z3Nx

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in a sandwich baggie
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a sandwich baggie, and the light was turned on and very dim. This was the third one that I bought and the previous two came in the original Coast packaging, and that's what I expected with this one. I'd assume this was a return and was shipped to me. This was going to be a gift, but it's a bit "tacky" to give a gift that's not in the new package,. This is getting retuned by me. When I buy new, I expect new in the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Crazy good buy!  Coast G20 light.
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding me???? Ordered this light yesterday and received it before 6pm thanks to Prime and $2.99 for expedited shipping. I have been playing with it on and off since I opened it and so far, it’s one of the best lights I’ve ever owned! Crazy bright for a pen light and a perfect beam!!! It’s well built and solid feeling. The price is unbelievable. Worth well more than $8. Will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: The Real Taz

customer_reviews.title: Light so bright! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product, I initially bought it because I’m a nurse and wanted a reliable, heavy duty pen light. I will admit I did not read about the product because if I had I would know THIS IS NOT USEFUL IN A HEALTH CARE SETTING. The light is so bright it hurts. I gave it to my husband who works on machinery and it’s perfect! Highly recommend this product just not for my initial intent. Haha.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie J

customer_reviews.title: Great inspection light for my tech work
customer_reviews.text: 25+ years as a field-based technician. Really like this light. It's bright enough for doing inspection work on small parts without being blinding like some other, brighter lights. I work in small, confined areas at times, so it's size is a benefit as well. Slips into a pocket easily and hangs out in my tool bag when it's not in my pocket. Battery life has been great as well. Has survived the daily drops/bangs well and has handled being in sub-zero weather too. Great light, highly recommend, especially at the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Benchtest

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this penlight is great. I work as a paramedic at night. Sometimes I forget my flashlight in the ambulance so I’ll use this penlight which works pretty good. It’s just bright enough to use for lighting your way or expe everything about this penlight is great. I work as a paramedic at night. Sometimes I forget my flashlight in the ambulance so I’ll use this penlight which works pretty good. It’s just bright enough to use for lighting your way or inspecting someone’s pupils or their injuries. It also comes with a convenient clip so that you can keep it on your belt or in your skinny pant pocket
customer_reviews.author: Christian Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Don’t last it all
customer_reviews.text: Dropped 1 of them, and the other just randomly crapped out for no reason. So in total I purchased 2 at 2 different times and they both don’t work. I’d honestly like to return them and get my money back.... better off buying name brand if you use this like I do for work everyday. Not aircraft mechanic approved
customer_reviews.author: chris yeager

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for detail inspection AND...
customer_reviews.text: ... also excellent for providing a tight circular spotlight of just the right size and brightness on the ground immediately around you when walking around a dark campsite where a large flashlight would be annoying to others. The only disappointment to me is you must fully “click on” the light for a quick look around (followed by “click off”)... it would a great improvement if you could partially depress the button for a “momentary” light.
customer_reviews.author: G-Dub

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Multi-Purpose light!
customer_reviews.text: Man this is my most important tool in my inventory! I use it for everything from camping in the dark to general work around the house and even as an inspection light when I detail my cars! This is a pretty bright light for its size and definitely beats those cheap led flashlights by a lot! It’s really durable too considering I’ve dropped it multiple times and the battery life is also amazing considering how bright it is!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Franco

customer_reviews.title: Started flickering after 2 days, never dropped just a poor quality unreliable flashlight.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad light, when it worked! I bought this for work and it lasted all of 2 days! I never even dropped it, it just started flickering. Really disappointed as it seemed like a nice little light, externally it seems pretty good quality but the internals are unreliable. I had a coworker tell me he had a similar experience with a different Coast flashlight model. I will NEVER purchase another Coast product, they just aren't reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Button is easy to depress in your pocket
customer_reviews.text: So far so good carried in my pocket for one day and my only complaint is that every time I went to use it, the light was on inside my pocket. I work HVAC and will use it numerous times a day to check things and dark areas before putting my head into an area. Light is compact, seems sturdy, has a crisp beam and is plenty bright within close ranges. If you are going to use the pocket clip, you’ll probably find that the light turns on anytime you move around through the day. You
customer_reviews.author: Justin V.

customer_reviews.title: Nice light.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for myself plus one other one which I gave to a friend. Works good, bright light. Since it is an inspection light the beam is somewhat narrowly focused. One issue that I am finding is that from time to time it won't light up when I turn it on. I find that if I tap the front end the light does come on. Should not have to do that. The friend to whom I gave one of these reports the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: PaulM

customer_reviews.title: Great light, focused Beam
customer_reviews.text: Great little pen light with a super focused beam, overall I have had no complaints. It is very handy to keep around the house and when working on a car because of the focused beam I'm not washing out the entire area with light. it is not going to work as a spot light for any great distance, but works really well for tight spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Kleinsak

customer_reviews.title: Functional But Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: The flashlight works, feels solid, and has a decent lens. However, the end cap threads are rough, it puts out less light than one of my single cell AAA flashlights, and it costs more than a lot of its competitors. It may be that the flashlight I received shipped with old batteries, which could account for the modest light output, but even that would be somewhat blameworthy.
customer_reviews.author: W. Fitch

customer_reviews.title: One of the best lights available
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Coast g20. I had the first one for 3 years. It has been dropped several floors at a time, washed with work clothes a few times, hit by several grinders, and collected some weld spatter. It has never failed best light I've owned. Only buying a replacement because someone thought they needed it more then I did.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Great Flashlight and Lifetime Warranty is For Real
customer_reviews.text: This is a great flashlight and company!!! I use it as a construction manager to inspect renovation projects; the brightness and size of the flashlight could not be better for what I do. After several months of use the batteries finally failed without losing any brightness. Went to replace the original batteries that came with the flashlight and they had become corroded and stuck inside. Sent a email to Coast and they responded quickly and replaced the flashlight three days after I sent a picture of it to them. This kind of support and service is commendable.
customer_reviews.author: Thospal

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction and light weight but light isn't clear
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is superb. The construction is solid and the light feels good in your hands as its lightweight However, the light doesn't shine evenly. As you can see in the picture, the light is darker on one side and doesnt give consistent brightness. It almost looks like the dark side of the moon. I tried cleaning the lens and new batteries but it didnt help.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the size or price fool you
customer_reviews.text: For an $8.00 penlight, this little thing is quite good. The battery life and brightness is good and it's surprisingly strong for it's size. I work in an automotive shop and it's been dropped, ran over and tossed around many times and it still works. What I want to know is.... Why can an $8.00 penlight hold up to so much use and abuse, but a $200.00 light stops working if you look at it too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright circle beam, compact, well built.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for doing automotive inspections. Not sure how it compares to the $50 variety the tool trucks sell, but it creates a nice consistent bright beam as an inspection light should. It has a metal barrel, feels robust. Is the perfect size for carrying around in a shirt or jean pocket. It is Made in China, I prefer USA. But my mag lite isn’t an inspection light. Serves a different purpose.
customer_reviews.author: asm154

customer_reviews.title: Decent Value
customer_reviews.text: I like G20 so far. I bought one to try as part of my EDC package. It's held up great and been 100% reliable in spite of my abuse. I plan on getting a couple more...they are a nice balance between cost & value in my view. I don't tend to mind losing or destroying one over my higher cost options like the Olight (which I like too). Decent value to me.
customer_reviews.author: Larry B

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I have not had this product long enough to evaluate the battery life, but I really do love the sturdiness and durability of the product and that it shines really bright. There is a nice little clip on the side of it so you can clip it to your EMS pants or a bookbag which is really nice so it does not get lost in everything else. Overall, I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: SPOT ON
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what it does . Has more then enough light to do inspection work . Exceptionally long burn time which is more important to me then overall brightness It is of heavy duty construction, I think you could run over this thing with your car and it would still work. It is also great for general use when you not trying to light up the entire block.
customer_reviews.author: Joeybones

customer_reviews.title: Bright Little Light and Easy to Carry
customer_reviews.text: I keep a few of these around the house and in the vehicles. They are convenient because you can stash them anywhere. They are lightweight, easy to access, and bright enough to get the light work done. I wouldn't take one as a primary light source if you're doing something intense or more long-term because they are not as bright as the more expensive lights and the focused beam they use won't light up the sky by any means. However, for the things most people do they should work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Roanoke9000

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light, not recommended for medical use.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light. Extremely sturdy and works very well. Has a nice hefty and well-built feel. Nice clean white light that is even. Excellent for inspection and illuminating heard to see places. Wouldn't recommend for use on patients - it's a bit too bright. I suspected this from the beginning but still wanted to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Parth Pancholi

customer_reviews.title: Very good inspection light
customer_reviews.text: This little light puts out a very clean circle of even light, perfect as an inspection light. It wouldn't be good for trying to walk around in a dark forest at night but the clear light is very nice when you're examining wiring in a ceiling for instance. It also seems to be made very well, has a simple on/off switch without a bunch of strobe modes to cycle through, and it even came with Duracell batteries. It's worlds better than the little flashlights you usually find at this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Close- Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This is very close to the light I want...just a spot beam, nice and crisp, just not terribly bright. It definitely IS a good value, and 2 are enough for me. I don't care for multi-beam lights, or twist to adjust the beam lights. That's what you got, a moderately bright, single function, spot beam light for under $10.
customer_reviews.author: TSisms

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the small size of this flashlight. Fits perfectly in your hand (or mouth if your hands are full) and provides a nice focused (non-adjustable) beam of light. The light is not particularly bright but bright enough. This type of flashlight is meant to be used to inspect small spaces so it does not need to be extremely bright. The switch turns it on and off, no flashes or other settings which I like. I mostly use it when poking around under the hood of my car.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointing
customer_reviews.text: What are you expect for a flashlight under $10? The beam is way dimmer than I was expecting and 40% of the time I have to tap the flashlight on something after it’s turned on before it will illuminate. The focus beam is a cool novelty that may be useful for a nightclub bouncer checking people’s IDs but for a mechanic like myself it’s not very useful. I much rather have a broader beam.
customer_reviews.author: TheCottonTop

customer_reviews.title: In my work-shirt pocket at all times.
customer_reviews.text: Just about everyone in my family has these now. I found the first one at Fry's Electronics. Terrific battery life, awesome beam, super light weight, rugged. these are a very cool and practical product. great git idea for just about anyone. who doesn't need to peer into the darkness now and then?
customer_reviews.author: Jordi

customer_reviews.title: Could be brighter, but it ain’t no thang.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t give full marks for brightness, though I know full well coast makes brighter lights more specifically for different purpose. I would like a brighter inspection light with a maybe different setting for white vs yellow vs more orange tone, but I use this light to inspect paint for detailing so I’m extremely picky... it’s a great light. Always travels with me, gets used daily, I show it off to anyone I can and I do truly love it. If you’re looking for a hood inspection light, pick this one.
customer_reviews.author: The Oval Chef

customer_reviews.title: Good expendable light
customer_reviews.text: Had this light for almost exactly a year. Up until a few days ago, I carried it everyday and it was great. Good light, small enough to fit in your pocket comfortably, tough, etc. Basically everything you'd want in a pen light. Then it stopped working. Swapped batteries and fiddled with it a bit and it started working again. Cool. Then it happened again, and no amount of fiddling or new batteries (of multiple brands) will bring it back to life. It's cheap, but I expected more longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bright Penlight
customer_reviews.text: I like this handy little penlight- it is very sturdy, uses 2 AAA batteries which last quite some time. The radius of the light beam expands from small close range beam to a wide area beam depending on distance. The penlight has a handy shirt clip (probably not suited for a belt), fits in pocket. Very reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: SMART DOBERMAN

customer_reviews.title: BEST FLASHLIGHT EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Its a portable, pocket worthy addition to your EDC. It produces a concentrated beam, well....its a flashlight for gods sakes. Anyhow The day after i recieved it in the mail our power went out for three hours in the early morning and guess what? I could see stuff in the dark, yep...Who would of thunk it? Seriously, why spend 70+ dollars on a flashlight when you can get the same results on a flashlight that casts a perfect beam of pure white light for less? It won't kill vampires, break glass windows, or save the whales but at least you won't stub your toe.
customer_reviews.author: david richardson

customer_reviews.title: The G20 is a larger version of the G10, of which I have several.
customer_reviews.text: I use these flashlights for working in tight spaces and also find it useful when walking my dog after dark. Just point it at the area you need light and I bright beam provides al you need. The company also provides fast and competent customer service and advice.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hakemian

customer_reviews.title: Great little flashlight
customer_reviews.text: I really like these small Coast LED flashlights and own several of them, including models G20, G19 and HP2. They are small (G19 and HP2 about 4”; G20 about 5.6”) and handy and put out a lot of light. They are good to keep in a purse or car glove box so you always have a decent light handy. I also like to keep them in various locations throughout the home. Excellent little flashlights for the price. Would definitely recommend Coast flashlights.
customer_reviews.author: Connie P

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting...
customer_reviews.text: I came across this item when looking for a pen light for nursing school. I had already looked at countless ones with terrible reviews and this one finally had good ones, so I ordered. Didn't pay too much attention. Until I went to do a neuro check on a patient. If he wasn't blind before, he might be now. Definitely don't recommend for nursing, but maybe camping.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long for me
customer_reviews.text: I’m a welder and used this light to inspect my welds or whatever I have to weld so I use it all the time. Occasionally it’ll slip out of my hand and either fall to the ground or on the metal. I didn’t have a problem with how much light it was putting out. It was actually perfect. But it didn’t take long for it to start going bad and not be as bright like it used to. Then one day it just stopped turning on. I only had it for a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: xReaper57x

customer_reviews.title: I Paid $11 For This Light
customer_reviews.text: And that was almost exactly 2 years ago. Good quality; I've replaced the battery only once. Nice bright light and the push button is easy to use. It's very useful. In the kitchen to find things in the bottom cabinets. Near my TV chair if I need to read or write something. At work to get meter or gauge readings. A must have after dark. I bought the green Coast flashlight 3yrs. ago.
customer_reviews.author: WVU Alumnus in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Bad switch? On sale for that reason???
customer_reviews.text: Just got my G20 flashlight and seems to be built very well but when i push rear button to turn it on, goes on but another push and it stays on! Unscrewed button and it was all good but does same thing. Whats up with that? Update....works fine now,maybe needs break-in time?
customer_reviews.author: Tony Bado

customer_reviews.title: Great little light.
customer_reviews.text: This light feels very well made. Exactly as described. Does what it says it will do. I like the rubber cover over the on/ off switch. Comes with Duracell batteries to boot, not those cheapies like most things that include batteries. Only had it a couple days so don't know about battery life or durability but I don't see a need for concern with those.
customer_reviews.author: Smileyguy

customer_reviews.title: Interesting and solid value for money
customer_reviews.text: Very interesting beam of light projected from this little light. Edges of the beam are crisp, brightness is very uniform... never used a flashlight quite like it before. Clip is sturdy, overall construction of the light appears durable and hard wearing.
customer_reviews.author: James Capozzi

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I'm work in industrial maintenance and I've had about 5 of these. I really wanted to like them but after a while you'll find yourself having to tap them against something to make them work. I finally started buying Gear light instead and they're way more reliable and less expensive
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Solid, but light enough for holding while working
customer_reviews.text: VERY bright and focused beam. I’ve purchased coast flashlights before, they are quality products. Picked a few of these up on a lightning deal for stocking stuffers, they are solid and a decent weight have a great beam and are perfect for project work, car repairs or looking for the breaker box during a power outage. The beam is focused and works well up to about 6 feet, after that its just light.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: A must have for night patrol
customer_reviews.text: This little flashlight is an absolute must for nightpatrol. I leave it clipped to my shoulder on my vest carrier and it makes it easy to write lickets or review driver's licenses without lighting up the whole neighborhood. Battery life is good, and flashlight is lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Aleakgirl

customer_reviews.title: Like a tank
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I've purchase. These little things are built like a tank. Can't tell how many times I've dropped it and has no issues. Only reason I've purchase a second one is the pvc button is starting to deteriorate after years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Mahanna

customer_reviews.title: Typical Coast quality, feels heavy in my pocket (cheapo lights don't) but it feels as though it's going to last
customer_reviews.text: I had a slimmer, lighter-weight pocket flashlight but it was obviously not great quality, and it didn't last long. That wasn't a surprise, but I really liked that I didn't feel it in my shirt pocket. This is a Coast flashlight and for $11 it seems like a great deal. I've got a couple of other Coast's and they are obviously good quality. This one isn't fancy but it feels as though it'll last. It feels heavy in my pocket, but that may just be the price to be paid for a quality light.
customer_reviews.author: Frobisher

customer_reviews.title: Fits in shirt pocket like a pen, gives just enough light to see
customer_reviews.text: I like flashlights so I tend to buy a bunch. This one is fast becoming my favorite because I find myself keepng it with me as it's easy to keep in a shirt pocket. It also provides enough light for seeing when you don't need bright light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Solid, well made, and easy to use. Quality materials and a good feel I’m the hand, this is the best pen flashlight I have come across. Excellent for stashing in a drawer, keeping in your glove compartment in your vehicle or as an extra emergency light in a backpack or purse.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny B Goode

customer_reviews.title: Not a perfect circle
customer_reviews.text: Defect in the light focusing lens likely due to inaccurate/imperfect production process/assembly. Doesn’t have a pure circle like some of the other pictures customers have posted and has a yellow crescent due to misalignment. Seems to be a problem experienced by many people here. That said, light is cheap and has a good construction. Batteries don’t appear to rattle in the handle. Switch works well for now.
customer_reviews.author: Lukhyun

customer_reviews.title: Like a small, portable narrow spot light.
customer_reviews.text: Durable light, that my puppy chews on, but hasn't harmed it. It's nice, bright and compact. Only thing I wasn't aware of when I purchased, was the light beam is like a spot, not a flood. So great for inspecting things, but doesn't cast a wide beam for walking in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Newman

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow beam, maybe 6" dia at 1' distance...only useful for inspection
customer_reviews.text: A typically high quality Coast flashlight. But, the beam diameter of illumination is so small that it is not very useful for around the home. For inspection it's great.......my mistake for not clearly understanding this application.
customer_reviews.author: glenn b

customer_reviews.title: This is worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This light is exactly what I needed. Small enough to carry everywhere and the light is bright but its not a glare like so many out there. If you’re working on something and you need to be able to see it well this is the light you need. Perfect circle light pattern, can’t say enough good about it. I’m buying more and giving them for gifts. Even came with 2 Duracell batteries in it. I had
customer_reviews.author: gradyshades

customer_reviews.title: Weirdly bright
customer_reviews.text: This penlight has a very strong white light. The problem is the color and brightness of the light washes out everything. So wherever you aim it all you’ll see is just this bright color that hides any details. Which pretty much makes this penlight unusable.
customer_reviews.author: belly pelt

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Good enough light for what it was designed to do, "inspect". Don't expect this to be substituted for a bright flashlight you go out the backyard or woods with then give it a bad review because it is not bright enough. It is an inspection light. The quality is very good. The on/off button is easy to access and operate.
customer_reviews.author: Rho Main

customer_reviews.title: Not bright at all.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this light a 2 star overall, because it's not as bright as I thought it would be, if you have something electrical to inspect and can get close to it, this light might work. Don't try to inspect something further than 5 ft, defenetly not for that. It feels well made, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle client

customer_reviews.title: Works great  - Just don't cut it in half.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my fiance for Christmas in 2017. Worked excellent until he left it on the steel shear at work and chopped it clean in half.. He did wish it concentrated the light in one place a little more (the beam was too wide), but was overall still very happy with it and carried it everywhere, every day. (as a Welder/Fabricator/Mechanic/general-fix-it-upper & MacGyver, so the thing was dropped, clamped, etc. Still pretty durable.) I ended up replacing it with another very similar one that has a dial to adjust the beam.
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: Shiny
customer_reviews.text: Works great, the only weak point is the cathode spring breaks loose after a while, to be fair I abuse the hell out of mine. I just soldered on a heavier spring and never had a problem again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Great flashlight and very compact.  Price was great also.
customer_reviews.text: These are very compact lights that lights up bright. The price was great so that is why I bought it. I actually bought 2 of them for a great price. I use them regularly for many different situations and have been sturdy so far. Great flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: Gokou

customer_reviews.title: Lost it after a week but a good light while i had it.
customer_reviews.text: Fell out of my pocket after a week when i was leaving the place i get my hair cut. Went back and it was gone obviously. Great little light.
customer_reviews.author: JBurr

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Had issue with switch on 1st one, Amazon sent out replacement and it works great. Good switch nd bright light
customer_reviews.author: PaGuy

customer_reviews.title: Pen light is fine... mine came in opened and used but it was fine.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a small inspection light. So brightness is appropriate.... Makes a perfect circle on the wall. When I got it from amazon my outer packaging was sealed but the light itself was opened. Looks like maybe an amazon employee tried it out. Idk. But for the price I kept it and didn’t return.
customer_reviews.author: Nick N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Slim BRIGHT light for every task
customer_reviews.text: Best flashlight I own and I own MANY. Sharp, bright and perfect spot helps to concentrate on your task. I now keep one in my truck, one in each of my 3 tool boxes, general, electrical and plumbing. AND I always have one in my back pocket, great when walking my dog at night to clean up his mess. It is slim enough that I don't even notice it when I sit down.
customer_reviews.author: P. MACK

customer_reviews.title: great little light
customer_reviews.text: I like the coast brand of lights this is my second "pen" light and I use it daily. Such a good little light that the first one I had was stolen when I set it down at for and left it unattended for less than a min.
customer_reviews.author: Mixted

customer_reviews.title: I call it "the moon" for the perfect circle.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a behavioral health tech on an acute care floor in a mental health hospital. I have to check my patients every 5-15 minutes to make sure they're breathing. This light has a perfect circle with no light bleed. It makes it so I can shine the light on their chest without lighting up their face. Its magnificent.
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Coast Makes the Best in Flashlights
customer_reviews.text: A great inspection light. very well made, what you expect from coast. I keep this light with me all the time. but I do not use the Duracell batteries that come with it. I had past trouble with good batteries leaking , Duracell customer service is excellent, they paid to replace what got destroyed . The procell that Duracell makes, is good, never had them leak.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Great little light
customer_reviews.text: I use this for working on my computers (old and new). I is plenty bright to see what you need to see and not too bright so that the light reflects off the chips and components making them hard to read. I'm very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SpeedD408

customer_reviews.title: Durable is the word
customer_reviews.text: I've spent alot over the years finding a reliable flashlight. The issue has always been the switch. Hold it in your mouth and all the other brands fail. This brand doesn't! HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: It is great if you want to light up something close. Put all the light where you need it. Could not live without one with inspection light. I own 3 of them one for each tool box and one to carry.
customer_reviews.author: JimW

customer_reviews.title: Best Goto Light
customer_reviews.text: Give my original to a family member. Ordered this one via Amazon. Arrived nicely packaged and protected. Like the metal construction and water proof. I carry this flashlight with me all the time. Excellent to have if you are involved in mechanics or IT work in Data Centers when looking into racked devices. Order arrived on time! Best to all.
customer_reviews.author: RayRodriguez

customer_reviews.title: nice uniform beam, long battery life
customer_reviews.text: bought this for the nice round uniform beam. Brightness is decent, but really bought it for the battery life (Rated at 10H). Nice because most if these types of flashlights die at 2H. Decent construction and brightness, and uniform round beam gives decent light without hotspots.
customer_reviews.author: JoAmazonDude

customer_reviews.title: Great pen light.
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a pen light in the hospital. It is a bit bright for pupillary response but does great in all other areas. I am a night shift nurse and use this all the time to see in rooms without turning on every light and waking up my patients.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Boeck

customer_reviews.title: Very good flashlight
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for work. He said it works so well and doesn't take up much room to carry. He can see so much better while inspecting wires and cables and screws on machines, and said he'd buy one again.
customer_reviews.author: PA female

customer_reviews.title: A+ beam and build quality, battery life could be better
customer_reviews.text: Batteries don't seem to last long in these Coast lights, but the beam is AWESOME. I have three of these and the beam brightness and edge quality is consistently great between them. These put a lot more light on target than regular diffuse beams. I use them to point out parts of the work to others during design brainstorming and they BRIGHTLY highlight exactly what I want and let me draw people's attention from point to point.
customer_reviews.author: M. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Reliable light
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little light to keep in the toolbox at work. Minimal space for a handy, bright light. Concentrated light helps view dark areas in machinery easily. Cost can't be beat either.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan
